```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>CreateJS - EaselJS Example</title>

    <!-— Import the EaselJS Library --> 
    <script src="img/easeljs-0.5.0.min.js"></script>

    <script>
      function init() {
        // We can place our custom code here.
      }
    </script>
  </head>

  <body onload="init()">
    <canvas id="exampleCanvas" width="800" height="600">
  </body>
</html>
```
